about_the_game:
Manual Overcycle is the evolution of bicycle gameplay. With it's unique physics-based gameplay, bicycle gamers finally have the expressive controls they have always dreamed of.

Dive into bicycle paradise with levels that feature famous bicycle landmarks and environmental elements.

Manual Overcycle features include:

Freedom Of Expression - Manual Overcycle’s physics-based controls don’t have any pre-programmed tricks - only the movement through the keyboard keys.

Revolutionary Controls - Manual Overycle puts you in complete control of your bike, whether its on the ground, in the air, or grinding down a handrail. The perfect balance of accessibility and depth, the control system allows you fully express yourself, from learning the basics to pushing the limits.

Explore - Manual Overcycle offers some cool maps for players to explore.

Key Features
  • Physics Based Bicycle Riding
  • Modern Control System
  • Replay Editor
  • Cool Maps
  • Day-Night Cycles
  • Photo Mode

name: Manual Overcycle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual-Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please drop quality settings if not seeing 60FPS. This game is best-played buttery smooth!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.5GHz Quad Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Consistent 58-60FPS on Ultra with these specs in pre-alpha testing.

short_description: Manual Overcycle is the evolution of bicycle gameplay. With it's unique physics-based gameplay, bicycle gamers finally have the expressive controls they have always dreamed of.
